question: India Ranks __________ on Global Talent Competitiveness Index.
explanation: India has moved up on a global index of talent competitiveness to the 81st position. Switzerland continues to top the list and it is followed by Singapore and the US. It is released every year on the first day of the World Economic Forum (WEF) annual meeting. India has improved its position from 92nd last year.Among BRICS nations China was ranked 54th, Russian Federation was placed at 56th, followed by South Africa (67) and Brazil (81).
